meanings.definition: A style of Jamaican pop music combining elements of rhythm and blues and ska.
meanings.sent1: The bluebeat music had a catchy rhythm that made everyone dance.
meanings.sent2: I love listening to bluebeat songs because they have a unique blend of different music styles.
meanings.sent3: The bluebeat tune played at the party got everyone moving and grooving.
meanings.sent4: Her voice was like a bluebeat, mixing soulful tones with upbeat melodies.
meanings.sent5: The bluebeat melody echoed through the streets, filling the air with joy.

meanings.definition: A fast tempo in music, especially in ska.
meanings.sent1: The band played their instruments at a bluebeat, keeping the audience energized.
meanings.sent2: The bluebeat of the drums set the pace for the entire song.
meanings.sent3: The bluebeat tempo was so quick that even the dancers had to catch their breath.
meanings.sent4: His heart raced to the bluebeat of the music, matching its rapid rhythm.
meanings.sent5: The bluebeat tempo was like a sprint, pushing the song forward with excitement.
